message.entry: Function RSETWRITE expects input files to be in the TIFF or NITF format.
When the source image is an Image Adapter object, you must specify an output file to RSETWRITE.
An image adapter object'' Colormap property must be an m-by-3 numeric matrix.
Function RSETWRITE expected its first input, sourceImage, to be a filename or an ImageAdapter object. See the documentation for RSETWRITE and ImageAdapter for more information.
The input image has {0,number,integer} samples. IMTOOL may not display all samples.
The input image must have at least 3 pixels in each dimension
One of the original image dimensions was smaller than the R-Set tile size.
The output directory ''{0}'' does not exist.
